title: Soda Increases Risk Of Early Death
article: Drinking soda can increase your risk of early death, even diet soda. The risk of early death may be increased by artificially sweetened soda.

title: Health Benefits Of Idli
article: A very common South Indian breakfast food, idli is a great source of carbohydrates and proteins.The fermentation process increases the bioavailability of proteins

title: Genetically Engineered Worms For Cancer
article: Japan have recently discovered a genetically engineered microscopic worm called nematodes that can help detect and kill cancerous cells.
